name: KaOs-Balls
description:
Thanks for playing my first game,KaOs Balls! This game is made to participate in the game Jam held by brackeys community. Its theme is Chaos and it fits the theme with its chaotic gameplay. Made with unity 

Use some audios assets from https://www.chosic.com/

Credits:

Developer- Divyansh Porwal

Art direction- Raj Jaiswal
